name: LoopTown
description:
A magical curse is causing this town to repeat 10 seconds at a time.

Click to interact with the people and items. Can you find the solution to break the loop?

Time to beat: About 3 minutes.

CONTROLS

Left Click to interact with the people and items

NOTES

I made this in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 51, "Every 10 Seconds". It was  pretty wild ride...at Saturday night at 11:00pm I realized that my entire idea I was doing just wasn't going to work at all and I had to throw everything out and start again. I'm glad that I got SOMETHING out the door!

Unfortunately a UI bug appeared right as I submitted. Though it looked right on my computer, it was wrong on others. So I uploaded a quick fix as a post compo version and the original is downloadble.

And thank YOU...the player!
